page.title: 17PUBS
page.content: There are 3 pubs in the village,all of which are tied to M&B breweries. 1. The New Inn. Despite its name,it has been in the village since the 13th century.It employs 5 staff.Sells pies,rolls,sweets and crisps.70% of its custom is from the village.It has its own Tug-of-War, darts and dominoes team. 2. The Dolphin. Has been in the village since 1717. The name is connected with the parish church in some way.The pub has been used for many activities including a doctors surgery,scout meeting place and even a Catholic church!Employs 7 staff,sells snacks,has darts teams. 3. The Red Lion. Has been there since 1696.Employs 6 staff,has a games room,sells bar snacks.Favourite drinks are Bass Beer for men and white wine for women.
